title: Engineering Project Manager - Connectivity Platforms
summary: The SWE Connectivity EPM team is looking for an engineering project manager with strong OS & HW fundamentals, excellent communication skills, and a desire to work with an amazing team. This cross functional role will involve working with Hardware, Software, Factory teams to track and manage the delivery of iOS/macOS Software to the module & system factory across different Apple products. A great opportunity for a project manager who is interested in technology and wants to help drive and deliver software used in various Hardware builds.
description: You will oversee the software deliverables to the wireless module & system factory during various hardware builds starting with development phase to mass production. This role requires an energetic and motivated individual with excellent communication, organization, and technical skills to work cross functionally with other organizations. Communication of status and risks to all levels of management is an expectation. Understanding of wireless technologies and hardware is a plus.
key_qualifications:
5+ years of working experience in software and project management
Strong program management skills with cross functional teams
Self-motivated and pro-active with demonstrated creative and critical thinking
Ability to drive multiple programs, prioritize and solve complex problems
Ability to understand and mitigate risks associated with programs
Exceptional verbal and written communication and presentation skills
Knowledge of Software and Hardware development lifecycle
Knowledge of WLAN & BT PHY/MAC and RF
